Masthead

Matt Lee
Fiction & Nonfiction Editor

Matt Lee is an actor, teacher, and writer based in Maryland. His work has been featured at Sleaze Mag, Tragickal, SOFT CARTEL, Philosophical Idiot, and fluland, among other venues. He has written and produced numerous works for the stage with Maryland Ensemble Theatre. He tweets @Gallows_Ticket. For more info visit mattleewrites.com.
